556 Send all 30+ million invaders to the vatican instead. Pope says he will accept them. 💩   SHITPOST   💩 posted 6 days ago by FBIAREFAGGOTS 24 comments award share report block MJTruthUltra @MJTruthUltra • 7d Womp womp womp… 🚨 Pope Leo says America needs deep reflection on how Illegal aliens are treated in the US — “You’re supposed to receive and welcome the foreigner.” Sorry Mr. Pope… you’re wrong. Scripture commands submission to LAWFUL authority (Rom 13:1–7). Illegal entry
